sentence.Network_en: The room was crowded and Barrelhouse was on duty.
sentence.Network_cn: 店堂里人满满的,巴雷尔豪斯正在照应着.

sentence.Network_en: We bought new computers for cash on the barrelhesd.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们以货到交款方式买了些新计算机.

sentence.Network_en: Vito paid cash on the barrelhead for a new car.
sentence.Network_cn: 维托付现金买了一辆新车.

auth_sentence.content: His playing reflected influences from country blues, barrelhouse and stride piano styles.
auth_sentence.res_content: His playing reflected influences from country blues, barrelhouse and stride piano styles.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His playing reflected influences from country blues, barrelhouse and stride piano styles.

auth_sentence.content: This can only be followed by a free-barrelhouse piano solo, and this is exactly what Hawkins delivers.
auth_sentence.res_content: This can only be followed by a free-barrelhouse piano solo, and this is exactly what Hawkins delivers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This can only be followed by a free-barrelhouse piano solo, and this is exactly what Hawkins delivers.

auth_sentence.content: Of course round these parts we all love Mr Holland, with his cheeky east-end banter and barrelhouse joanna-thumping style.
